Pauline Konga (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1970) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge lara ezumike nká
Na 1996 Summer Olympics ọ meriri ọlaọcha na mita 5000, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị Kenya mbụ meriri nrite Olympic.
N'afọ 1990, ọ gbara nke 125 na 1990 World Cross Country Championships
N'afọ 1991, ọ gara n'ihu ruo na nke iri na ise na 1991 World Cross Country Championships, wee bụrụ onye nke iri na abụọ na 3000 mita na 1991 World Championships

Ọ ghọkwara onye mmeri Kenya na ịgba ọsọ na-agafe mba (ogologo oge). N'afọ 1992, ọ gbara nke iri itoolu na asọmpi World Cross Country Championship nke afọ 1992, mana ọ gara nke asaa na asọmpi 1993 World Cross Country Championships, merikwara ọla edo na asọmpi otu.

Konga sonyere na egwuregwu Olimpik mbụ ya na afọ 1992, na-enweghị ọganihu site na okpomọkụ na mita 3000. N'afọ 1996 ọ ghọrọ onye mmeri mita 5000 nke Kenya ma mechie nke atọ na 1996 Grand Prix Final. N'egwuregwu Olimpik nke afọ 1996 ọ meriri nrite ọlaọcha na mita 5000, na-aghọ nwanyị Kenya mbụ meriri nrọ Olimpik.

Ihe kacha mma ya bụ 8:37.76 nkeji na mita 3000, nke o nwetara n'August 1996 na Monaco; 14:47.51 nkeji na mita 5000, nke o mere n'August 1997 na Köln; na 1:09:33 awa na ọkara marathon, nke o ruru na Jenụwarị na afo 1996 na Marrakech.
A mụrụ ya na Baringo District.  Ọ lụrụ Paul Bitok, onye ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na mita 5000 nke ụmụ nwoke na afọ 1996 Olympics.
